block.p: INFOCROSSING, Leonia, N.J., named Charles F. Auster president and chief executive. He had been executive vice president and chief operating officer at IXnet.
IRON MOUNTAIN, Boston, named Richard Reese, chairman and chief executive, to the additional post of president. He succeeds Peter Pierce, who resigned.
INFOCROSSING, Leonia, N.J., named Charles F. Auster president and chief executive. He had been executive vice president and chief operating officer at IXnet.
IRON MOUNTAIN, Boston, named Richard Reese, chairman and chief executive, to the additional post of president. He succeeds Peter Pierce, who resigned.

SUPERVALU, Minneapolis, named Jeff Noddle, executive vice president and chief operating officer at SuperValu distribution food companies, to the posts of president, chief operating officer and director.
XPEDIOR INC., Chicago, named Thomas Werner senior vice president and chief financial officer. He had been vice president and chief financial officer at uBid.com.

ZOWI.COM, San Francisco, named Randall M. Chesler president and chief executive, succeeding Roberta Jacobs, who becomes chief strategy officer. Mr. Chesler had been executive vice president at Associates First Capital.
